author: Anonymous Mouse
title: What is the grading like if we misunderstand the question?
question:
I know that in exam instructions it say that if you do not understand the instruction then re-read question. If you still do not understand then explain what you understand in comment.
I wanted to know how nice is the marking for this? My english is not perfect and programming makes it a bit hard. I am asking also because sometimes the question will not allow me to do the question the way I want to because my logic is wrong. What is it like in this case? Especially with auto-graded questions.
